---

<p>AI is eating into the value of "just coding", so what do you do about it? Colleen and Joe talk through how they're each adapting: AI-enabled services, getting more strategic with clients, and actually understanding what non-tech businesses need (not just what they say they want). Plus: cold outreach experiments, product ideas, and some financial housekeeping.</p><p></p><p><b>Takeaways:</b></p><ul><li>When coding becomes commoditized, strategy becomes the differentiator</li><li>Cold outreach isn't dead</li><li>The best opportunities come from understanding the business problem, not just the technical one</li></ul><p></p><p><b>Chapters:</b></p><ul><li>00:00 Adapting to AI eating our lunch</li><li>06:33 Cold outreach and building in public</li><li>16:25 What non-tech businesses actually need from us</li></ul>
